They also weigh almost nothing so won't tip you over the baggage limit at airports, meaning you can save money money at your destination on new clothes!
;
;The evident downside to duffel bags is the issue of protection for your belongings. Items can easily get broken, so if you're considering souvenir shopping a tote or backpack may be a better option. There's nothing worse than wanting to carry a heavy duffel or tote on one shoulder whilst walking straight down an uneven surface.
